short.ar: قارئ RSS قوي مع ملخصات الذكاء الاصطناعي وعروض متعددة وإدارة فعالة للتغذية.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: A modern RSS reader that helps you stay up to date with your favorite content
short.de: Ein leistungsstarker RSS-Reader mit KI-Zusammenfassungen, mehreren Ansichten und effizientem Feed-Management.
short.es: Un potente lector RSS con resúmenes de IA, múltiples vistas y gestión eficiente de feeds.
short.fr: Un lecteur RSS puissant avec résumés IA, vues multiples et gestion efficace des flux.
short.hi: एआई सारांश, कई दृश्यों और कुशल फ़ीड प्रबंधन के साथ एक शक्तिशाली आरएसएस रीडर।
short.it: Un potente lettore RSS con riassunti AI, visualizzazioni multiple e gestione efficiente dei feed.
short.ja: AI要約、複数のビュー、効率的なフィード管理を備えた強力なRSSリーダー。
short.ko: AI 요약, 다중 보기 및 효율적인 피드 관리 기능을 갖춘 강력한 RSS 리더입니다.
short.ru: Мощный RSS-ридер с AI-обзорами, множеством режимов просмотра и эффективным управлением лентами.
short.zh_CN: 用 AI 洞察力，开启智能 RSS 阅读新体验。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎯 RSSFlow Reader - Your Intelligent RSS Reading Assistant
Providing RSS subscription, AI summaries, and multi-dimensional information flow features to transform your reading experience.

💪 Core Features:

👉 RSS Subscription
  ✔️ One-Click Subscribe: Automatically detect and subscribe to RSS feeds with a single click
  ✔️ Smart Updates: Background synchronization ensures timely content updates

👉 AI Smart Summary
  ✔️ Multiple Models: Support for OpenAI format, Gemini, and other mainstream AI models
  ✔️ Intelligent Extraction: Automatically extract key information, viewpoints, and ratings
  ✔️ Custom Prompts: Customize prompts to create personalized summary styles
  ✔️ Offline Reading: Save AI summaries for anytime access

👉 Multi-dimensional Reading Views
  ✔️ DayFlow: Date-organized information flow for easy daily content review
  ✔️ TagFlow: Topic-based aggregation using smart tags for in-depth exploration
  ✔️ Full-text Reading: Support for both original text and summary preview modes
  ✔️ Infinite Scroll: Smooth content loading for uninterrupted reading

👉 Smart Toolbox
  ✔️ Full-text Search: Quickly locate historical articles and summaries
  ✔️ Similar Articles: Automatic detection of similar content to avoid duplicates
  ✔️ Keyword Extraction: Smart tagging system for automatic classification
  ✔️ Reading Statistics: Track reading habits and generate personalized reports

👉 Personalization
  ✔️ Dark Mode: Switch between light and dark themes for eye protection
  ✔️ Shortcuts: Customizable keyboard shortcuts
  ✔️ Wooden Fish Mode: Sound effects when marking as read to enhance focus
  ✔️ Multi-language: Support for Chinese, English, and other interface languages

💻 How to Use:
🔸 Click "Add to Chrome" and pin to toolbar
🔸 Click the extension icon to open sidebar
🔸 Add your favorite RSS feeds
🔸 Complete the AI model configuration
🔸 Start your smart reading journey!

💡 Use Cases
🔸 Tech enthusiasts tracking industry trends
🔸 Researchers following academic news
🔸 Investors monitoring financial news
🔸 Content creators gathering inspiration
🔸 Journalists organizing information

❓ FAQ:

📌 Are all RSS feeds supported?
- Supports mainstream RSS/Atom formats, including RSS 2.0, RSS 1.0, Atom, etc.

📌 Does AI summary feature require additional payment?
- RSS reading and AI summary features are free to use. Podcast content generation requires activation code
- Users need to choose and configure their preferred AI models. Any costs associated with using AI models are independent of this extension

📌 Where is data stored?
- All data is stored locally without any cloud storage or synchronization, ensuring your reading privacy

🌟 Special Notes:
- Completely local storage to protect your reading privacy
- Continuous updates and maintenance
- Professional technical support with quick response to user feedback
long.zh_CN:
🎯 RSSFlow Reader - 您的智能 RSS 阅读助手
为您提供订阅RSS、AI 摘要、多维视图信息流功能，让你的阅读体验焕然一新。

💪 核心功能：

👉 RSS订阅
  ✔️ 一键订阅：自动识别网页 RSS 源，一键完成订阅
  ✔️ 智能更新：后台自动同步更新，及时获取最新内容


👉 AI 智能摘要
  ✔️ 多模型支持：支持openai格式、Gemini 等主流 AI 模型
  ✔️ 智能提取：自动提取文章关键信息、观点和评分
  ✔️ 自定义提示：支持自定义提示词，打造个性化摘要风格
  ✔️ 离线阅读：支持保存 AI 摘要，随时查看

👉 多维阅读视图
  ✔️ DayFlow：按日期组织的信息流，轻松回顾每日重要内容
  ✔️ TagFlow：基于智能标签的主题聚合，深入了解特定领域
  ✔️ 全文阅读：支持原文阅读和摘要快览两种模式
  ✔️ 无限滚动：流畅加载更多内容，不中断阅读体验

👉 智能工具箱
  ✔️ 全文搜索：快速定位历史文章和摘要内容
  ✔️ 相似文章：自动检测相似内容，避免重复阅读
  ✔️ 关键词提取：智能标签系统，自动分类整理
  ✔️ 阅读统计：追踪阅读习惯，生成个性化阅读报告

👉 个性化体验
  ✔️ 深色模式：支持明暗主题切换，保护眼睛
  ✔️ 快捷键：可自定义的快捷键操作
  ✔️ 木鱼模式：标记已读时播放木鱼音效，提升专注度
  ✔️ 多语言：支持中文、英文等多种界面语言

💻 使用方法：
🔸 点击"添加到 Chrome"按钮并固定到工具栏
🔸 点击扩展图标打开侧边栏
🔸 添加您感兴趣的 RSS 源
🔸 完成大模型相关的配置信息的配置
🔸 开启智能阅读之旅！

💡适用场景
🔸科技爱好者追踪业界动态
🔸研究人员跟踪学术资讯
🔸投资者关注财经新闻
🔸 内容创作者收集灵感
🔸 新闻工作者整理信息

❓ 常见问题：

📌 是否支持所有 RSS 源？
- 支持主流的 RSS/Atom 格式，包括 RSS 2.0、RSS 1.0、Atom 等

📌 AI 摘要功能是否需要额外付费？
- RSS阅读功能、AI摘要功能免费使用，播客内容生成需要激活码进行功能激活
- 需要根据自己需求自行选用大模型并配置，使用大模型产生的费用跟本扩展无关。

📌 数据存储在哪里？
- 所有数据存储在本地，不进行任何云端保存或同步，确保您的阅读隐私


🌟 特别说明：
- 完全本地化存储，保护您的阅读隐私
- 持续更新维护，及时修复问题
- 专业的技术支持，快速响应用户反馈
